title: Barcelona's Lack of Leadership?
description:
The FC crew continue to react to Barcelona's UCL exit at the group stage and question if Barcelona's lack of leadership is the main reason for their lack of success in big games this season. Plus, the guys argue if LaLiga is on a decline after Real Madrid was the only Spanish club to make the knockout stage of the Champions League and react to Darwin Nunez seeking out Luis Suarez on some anger management advice.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Revisiting Barcelona's UCL exit; Real Madrid become only LaLiga club to qualify for knockout stage; Darwin Nunez gets advice from Luis Suarez
